name: Rock, Scissor, Paper, Prostetic! (Open-Sourced)
description:
Didn't have time during weekend but still wanted to learn how to make rock, scissor, paper mechanic.
Theoretically it should work on mobiles too.

Source - https://github.com/nezvers/Godot_jam_games_3.1
